hub.essence: Walking the path of healing with tobacco, plants, and ceremony

offerings.label: Sacred Work
offerings.title: Offerings
offerings.intro: Each path of healing is unique. Through sacred plants and ceremony, I offer guidance for those called to walk this ancient way of transformation and remembrance.

tobacco.title: Healing Sessions with Tobacco
tobacco.subtitle: Private & Group Work
tobacco.description: The sacred tobacco plant has been used for millennia as a powerful ally in healing work. Through ceremonial use, we connect with its spirit to cleanse, protect, and open pathways to deeper understanding.

ceremonies.title: Plant Ceremonies
ceremonies.subtitle: Sacred Medicine Gatherings
ceremonies.description: Held in ceremonial containers with deep respect for the traditions, these gatherings offer space for profound healing, insight, and connection with the plant spirits.

dieta.title: Plant Diet School
dieta.subtitle: The Dieta Path
dieta.description: The traditional plant diet (dieta) is a profound practice of isolation, fasting, and communion with plant spirits. Over weeks of dedicated practice, deep healing and learning unfolds.

talks.title: Talks & Lectures
talks.subtitle: Sharing Wisdom
talks.description: Educational talks and lectures on plant medicine traditions, healing practices, and the sacred path. Available for conferences, retreats, universities, and private gatherings.

events.label: Gatherings
events.title: Events & Workshops
events.intro: Coming together in sacred space amplifies the healing. These gatherings are invitations to step out of ordinary time and into communion with the plants and each other.

whiteBirch.title: Plant Diet with White Birch
whiteBirch.description: The White Birch is a powerful ally for cleansing and renewal. This two-week dieta offers deep connection with this gentle yet transformative plant spirit.

events.moreGatheringsNote: More gatherings are being woven into the calendar...

journey.label: The Path
journey.title: My Journey
journey.essence: The plants chose me, as they choose all who walk this path with sincerity.

beginning.title: The Beginning
beginning.content: [Your early life and the seeds that were planted for this path. What drew you initially? What were you seeking?]

calling.title: The Calling
calling.content: [The moment or period when the plants called you. Your first encounters with sacred medicine. The recognition that this was your path.]

apprenticeship.title: Meeting the Plants
apprenticeship.content: [Your training and apprenticeship. The teachers, human and plant, who guided you. The dietas, ceremonies, and lessons learned.]

present.title: The Path Now
present.content: [Where you are today. Your approach to healing work. Your vision and what you offer to those who come to you.]

closing.title: If My Path Resonates With Yours...
closing.text: I welcome sincere seekers who feel called to this work. Reach out, and let us see what medicine wants to unfold.
